# netbox_notification_group (Data Source)

Use this data source to get information about a notification group in NetBox.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Look up an existing notification group by ID
data "netbox_notification_group" "ops_team" {
  id = "1"
}

# Use the notification group data
output "notification_group_name" {
  value = data.netbox_notification_group.ops_team.name
}

output "notification_group_description" {
  value = data.netbox_notification_group.ops_team.description
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The unique numeric ID of the notification group to look up.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) A description of the notification group.
- `group_ids` (Set of Number) Set of user group IDs included in this notification group.
- `groups` (Attributes Set) The user groups included in this notification group. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--groups))
- `name` (String) The name of the notification group.
- `user_ids` (Set of Number) Set of user IDs included in this notification group.
- `users` (Attributes Set) The users included in this notification group. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--users))

<a id="nestedatt--groups"></a>
### Nested Schema for `groups`

Read-Only:

- `description` (String) A description of the group.
- `id` (Number) The unique numeric ID of the group.
- `name` (String) The name of the group.


<a id="nestedatt--users"></a>
### Nested Schema for `users`

Read-Only:

- `id` (Number) The unique numeric ID of the user.
- `username` (String) The username of the user.
